column2:
SELECT 
  cases.case_number, 
  case_type, 
  filing_date, 
  name, 
  connection, 
  officer_id,
  COALESCE(name, officer_id) AS name2
FROM cases
INNER JOIN dscr_related_persons AS people
ON cases.case_number = people.case_number
WHERE filing_date >= '2017-01-01'
AND connection ILIKE '%POLICE OFFICER%';
